Name: Ares-Sama
Story: 'You're either brave, or incredibly foolish. Very well. I will tell you, since you want to know so badly.'

Name: Ares-Sama
Story: 'You see, I give off the appearance of a young eraser tool. But tis only an illusion to preserve your sanity.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Maybe failing would have been the better option.

Name: Ares-Sama
Story: 'In truth, I am a powerful demon lord known as the Supreme Overlord of the Canvas!'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: She leans in closer to me. Her face is barely an inch from mine.

Name: Ares-Sama
Story: 'Haven't you noticed it? All of these pixelated low-quality images. How wobbly we all are?'
Choices: I think we look pretty good
